ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (MHS_Confirmed_Rate__c < MHS_Published_Rate__c || ISBLANK(MHS_Confirmed_Rate__c) || MHS_Confirmed_Rate__c = 0 ) && ( ISPICKVAL( MHS_Status__c , 'Accepted') || ISPICKVAL( MHS_Status__c , 'Auto-Accepted'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When the MHS Status is Accepted or Auto-Accepted the value in the MHS Confirmed Rate must be equal to or greater than the value in the MHS Published Rate.
